org.spongepowered.api.event.network

Interface ClientConnectionEvent.Join

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientConnectionEvent, Event, MessageChannelEvent, MessageEvent, TargetEntityEvent, TargetHumanoidEvent, TargetLivingEvent, TargetPlayerEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    ClientConnectionEvent

    public static interface ClientConnectionEvent.Join
extends ClientConnectionEvent, TargetPlayerEvent, MessageChannelEvent
    Called when a Player joins the game World for the first time after initial connection.

    The SpawnEntityEvent for the Player is fired after the #Login event. This event is fired after both.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.network.ClientConnectionEvent
